name: Vaporwave Pizza Co
description:
VaporwavePizzaCo!

You are working for Chef making pizzas. Grab ingredients and put them on the pizza. Oh, grabbing also slows time, regardless if you have something in your hand or not. PROTIP: You move slightly faster in slow down, but time is money!

Made for the #GMTKjam in July 2017, this 48-hour game jam theme was "dual purpose", thus the dual purpose of grabbing items and slowing time.

CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys / LStick: Move Hand
SPACEBAR / (A) Button / JOY Button 1: Grab

(sorry d-pad support wasn't working and I needed to turn this in. Stick or keyboard arrows only.)

3rd Party Stuff:

Picture of chef is this: https://www.pexels.com/photo/food-kitchen-eat-cooking-33614/

Font is PC Senior: http://www.1001fonts.com/pc-senior-font.html

Libraries:
* SDL used for lots of stuff. (render, sound, events) https://www.libsdl.org
* LZ4 for compression.  https://github.com/lz4/lz4/
